short_summary: Supply, delivery and installation of 9 72” x 84” L-sit stand, 30” deep, min 26-48”h range.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by August 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for the supply, delivery and installation of 9 72” x 84” L-sit stand, 30” deep, min 26-48”h range. Each sit stand to have a minimum four (4) outlet power bar securely attached to underside of the unit to accommodate the power module & monitors.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### Title and Reference Number
The Department of the Environment, Environment and Climate Change Canada has a procurement requirement for the supply, delivery, and installation of 9 L-sit stands.

### Technical Details

The L-sit stands must meet the following specifications:

* Dimensions: 72” x 84”
* Depth: 30”
* Height adjustment range: 26-48”
* Each stand must have a minimum of 4 outlet power bar securely attached to the underside of the unit to accommodate the power module and monitors.

### Tender Overview

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued on August 9, 2023, for the procurement of the L-sit stands. The RFP can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery portal.

**Important Dates**

* Tender closing date: August 24, 2023, at 14:00 HRN
* Expected contract start date: August 24, 2023
* Expected contract end date: Not yet determined

### Contact Details

For inquiries regarding this tender, please contact Abou Ahmad, Kassan, at kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada.

### Procurement Method

This tender is a Request for Proposal with the selection criteria based on lowest price. The procurement method is competitive, and bids will be submitted through a(Canvas complaints webs)


### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
